info.author: Anfernee Jervis
info.description:
GrayPython
===============================

Overview
--------

Python logging handlers for sending logs to graylog.

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install graypython


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/ajpen/graypython.git
    $ python setup.py install
    
Contributing
------------

Pull requests and discussions are welcomed. Changes that make sense are merged. 

Example
-------

### DictConfig Example:
```
import socket

        'handlers': {

            'graylog': {
                'class': 'graypython.GraylogHTTPGelfHandler',
                'url': 'http://127.0.0.1:12201/gelf',
                'host': socket.gethostbyname(socket.getfqdn())
            },
        }
```


### Script Example:

```
import logging
import socket
from graypython import GraylogHTTPGelfHandler

handler = GraylogHTTPGelfHandler(
    host=socket.gethostbyname(socket.getfqdn()),
    url='http://127.0.0.1:12201/gelf',
    include_attr=['levelname']
)
```
info.name: graypython
info.summary: Python logging handlers for sending logs to graylog.
